meta.title: Table d'Adrian â€“ Private Chef & Bespoke Dining Worldwide
meta.description: Luxury private chef and bespoke dining by Chef Adrian in Monaco, Miami, New York City, Dubai, London, Courchevel, Geneva, and worldwide.

hero.title: Private Chef & Luxury Dining Experiences Worldwide
hero.description: Michelin-caliber gastronomy choreographed for villas, penthouses, yachts, and private jets across the globe.

cards.title: Immersive Gastronomy
paragraphs: Menus choreographed for villas, penthouses, yachts, and private jets across Monaco, Miami, New York City, Dubai, London, Courchevel, Geneva, and worldwide.
Seasonal terroir, Asian nuance, and Middle Eastern warmth interpreted through Michelin-caliber technique.

cards.title: Global Hospitality
paragraphs: Multilingual sommeliers, butlers, florists, and mixologists ensure silent service and anticipatory care in every destination.
Wellness, longevity, and indulgence harmonized through pharmacist-informed programming.

cards.title: Artistry & Logistics
paragraphs: Tablescapes, music, lighting, rentals, and nondisclosure agreements orchestrated by the atelier.
Post-event documentation, provisioning, and concierge follow-up keep households aligned between engagements.

included.title: What the Atelier Provides
paragraphs: Discovery consultation capturing guest preferences, cultural notes, and wellness goals.
Menu design, wine pairings, florals, and styling bespoke to each location.
Culinary brigade, sommeliers, service staff, and coordinators trained in palace, yacht, and jet etiquette.

steps.title: 1. Discovery
steps.detail: Share location, guest list, celebration tone, and scheduling requirements.

steps.title: 2. Design
steps.detail: Chef Adrian drafts tasting arcs and hospitality concepts aligned with your narrative.

steps.title: 3. Production
steps.detail: Atelier coordinates staffing, rentals, logistics, and travel across continents.

steps.title: 4. Delivery
steps.detail: White-glove execution with optional documentation and concierge follow-up.

pricing.title: Signature Experiences

tiers.title: Signature Tasting
tiers.description: Twelve-course degustations for private residences and collectors worldwide.

tiers.title: Performance Dinner
tiers.description: Longevity-focused menus for leadership retreats, wellness residencies, and elite sport programs.

tiers.title: Salon Supper
tiers.description: Family-style opulence for yachts, chalets, and penthouses with immersive storytelling.

pricing.note: Investment varies by destination, logistics, and requested services. Worldwide travel supported year-round.

items.quote: A Michelin-caliber restaurant appeared inside our Monaco villa. Service was silent, choreography impeccable, and cuisine unforgettable.
items.name: Private host, Monaco

items.quote: Our New York corporate retreat became a sensory voyage that deepened relationships and inspired leadership.
items.name: CEO, global advisory firm

items.quote: The Dubai yacht residency delivered sunrise wellness menus and midnight indulgence without a single detail overlooked.
items.name: UHNW guest, GCC

finalCta.title: Commission Table d'Adrian
finalCta.description: Limited engagements accepted each season to preserve artistry and intimacy. Share your vision and the atelier will respond within 24 hours.
